events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your resume and skills.
A recruiter familiar with software development roles has been assigned to assist you through the recruitment process.
Your initial screening call went well; our recruiter discussed your experience with software engineering and next steps.
Thank you for promptly responding with your availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th, where you will discuss your development experience.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the interviewers were impressed by your problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you to discuss company culture, benefits, and other relevant policies.
The HR interview went smoothly, and they appreciated your alignment with the company values and team spirit.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the Software Engineer role including a comprehensive compensation package.
You have positively acknowledged the offer and provided feedback on the terms, expressing excitement about joining our team.
You have officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new member of the Engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started; you have received access to necessary tools, accounts, and training schedules.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now closed, and you have successfully joined our engineering workforce.
